import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { FormService } from 'src/app/form.service'; import { Experience } from 'src/app/models/experince'; import { Formulaire } from 'src/app/models/formulaire'; // import { jspdf } from 'jspdf'; @Component({ selector: 'app-affiche', templateUrl: './affiche.component.html', styleUrls: ['./affiche.component.css'] }) export class AfficheComponent { @Input() personne: Formulaire[] = []; constructor( private formServ: FormService ) { } ngOnInit() { console.log(this.personne); // console.log(this.personne[0].experience[0].title) } testihab() { console.log(this.personne); } getafteradd(): Formulaire { return this.formServ.getafteradd(); } // download() { // const doc = new jspdf(); // doc.text('Hello world!', 10, 10); // doc.save('a4.pdf'); // } download(){} } function downloadPDF() { throw new Error('Function not implemented.'); }
